title: Tom and Jerry cartoon festival. - Volume 1.
creator_credit: Hanna-Barbera Productions, Fred Quimby and Loews Incorporated
brief_description: In one adventure after another Tom and Jerry get themselves into all sorts of trouble. The program ends with the Academy Award winner “Cat concerto”.
